page.title: 03Pitcorthie Estate, Pitreavie
page.content: Pitreavie Housing Estate. In the early 1960's Pitreavie Housing Estate was built upon farms which were called Easter Pitcorthie and Wester Pitcorthie. The house builders were called Wimpey, Barratt, Fairclough and Miller, so there was no real owner and there were no shopping facilities on the site. In 1969 Pitreavie Primary School (our school) was built. It started with 200 pupils and then went up to 700 pupils. In 1975 houses were still being built for the new families in the estate and Canmore Primary, which is an open plan school, was built and half of our pupils went there. Since 1980 houses to the northwest of our school have been put up but there are still no shopping facilities in the area.
